Interface TreeMapLabelRenderer<N>

Type Parameters:
N -
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultTreeMapLabelRenderer, DefaultTreeMapLabelRenderer.UIResource
public interface TreeMapLabelRenderer<N>

This interface defines the method required to render labels in a TreeMapView.

Method Summary
